akn:section.akn:heading: Compensation of Deputy President pro tempore of Senate

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 6112. Compensation of Deputy President pro tempore of Senate Effective January 5, 1977, the compensation of a Deputy President pro tempore of the Senate shall be at a rate equal to the rate of annual compensation of the President pro tempore and the Majority and Minority Leaders of the Senate. (Pub. L. 95–26, title I, May 4, 1977, 91 Stat. 79.)
Editorial Notes Codification Section was formerly classified to section 32a of this title prior to editorial reclassification and renumbering as this section. Section is from the Supplemental Appropriations Act, 1977.
